'''''Other Minds'' 23''' is the twenty-third issue of ''[[Other Minds]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and other role playing games set in Middle-earth, published in October 2020.

* "Editorial"
** By [[Thomas Morwinsky]]
* "The Road Goes Ever On"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Inside Information"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Ravens in the North"
** By Andreas Erdmann
* "The Lossoth"
** By David Cole
* "Below the Surface"
** By Alexander Walker
* "Secrets of Wilderland"
** By José Enrique Vacas de la Rosa
* "Encountering Dragons"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "The Wings of Malady"
** By Olaf "Falenthal" Anguera
* "Long Journey to Deephallow"
** By Peter Bergman
